markup.content:
// 1. The <iframe> (and video player) will replace this <div> tag.
iframe.video-embed-item(allow='fullscreen' allowfullscreen='' height='225' src='https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/NKYPvcQ55oo?autohide=1&controls=1&enablejsapi=1' title='COSTA RICA IN 4K 60fps HDR (ULTRA HD)' width='400')
button#go get status
button#start Start
button#pause Pause
button#stop Stop
